description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Featuring all of your favourite Youtube stars, this is the first and only game that lets you truly Like, Favourite or Shoot them! With global leaderboards and HD graphics, this is your chance to gun with the stars!
